panels.title: Total Load (Number of Concurrent File Access)

targets.expr: hdfs_namenode_capacity_used {job="$job", cluster_id=~'$cluster', instance=~'$instance', role="NameNode", kind="FSNamesystem"}/ hdfs_namenode_capacity_total {job="$job", cluster_id=~'$cluster', instance=~'$instance', role="NameNode", kind="FSNamesystem"}

hdfs_namenode_blocks_total {job="$job", cluster_id=~'$cluster', instance=~'$instance', role="NameNode", kind="FSNamesystem"}/hdfs_namenode_block_capacity {job="$job", cluster_id=~'$cluster', instance=~'$instance', role="NameNode", kind="FSNamesystem"}

hdfs_namenode_capacity_used {job="$job", cluster_id=~'$cluster', instance=~'$instance', role="NameNode", kind="FSNamesystem"}/ hdfs_namenode_capacity_total {job="$job", cluster_id=~'$cluster', instance=~'$instance', role="NameNode", kind="FSNamesystem"}

hdfs_namenode_blocks_total {job="$job", cluster_id=~'$cluster', instance=~'$instance', role="NameNode", kind="FSNamesystem"}/hdfs_namenode_block_capacity {job="$job", cluster_id=~'$cluster', instance=~'$instance', role="NameNode", kind="FSNamesystem"}

hdfs_namenode_block_capacity {job="$job", cluster_id=~'$cluster', instance=~'$instance', role="NameNode", kind="FSNamesystem"} - hdfs_namenode_blocks_total {job="$job", cluster_id=~'$cluster', instance=~'$instance', role="NameNode", kind="FSNamesystem"}
